snippet: A top voting shareholder in Viacom and CBS wants more information about Sumner Redstone’s health and involvement at the companies.
abstract: Mario Gabelli, one of largest shareholders in Viacom and CBS, expresses worries about health of 92-year-old media mogul Sumner M Redstone and whether he should continue as executive chairman of firms.
lead_paragraph: A top voting shareholder in Viacom and CBS wants more information about Sumner Redstone’s health and involvement at the companies.

headline.main: Shareholder Calls for Check of Sumner Redstone’s Condition
headline.print_headline: Shareholder Calls for Check of Redstone’s Condition
